welcome.title: Welcome to Asset Tokenization Kit
welcome.description: Your gateway to secure, compliant asset tokenization on the blockchain.
welcome.setup-description-returning: We first need to finish the setup process. This ensures your assets are secure, your on-chain identity is established, and you're ready to experience the future of finance.
welcome.setup-description-new: We'll guide you through a quick setup process. This ensures your assets are secure, your on-chain identity is established, and you're ready to experience the future of finance.

wallet.title: Wallet
wallet.description: Set up your wallet and security measures

card-description: We've set up your wallet and will configure your identity on the blockchain to use this platform.

platform.title: Platform Setup
platform.description: Let's set up your digital asset platform

issuer.title: Issuer Setup
issuer.description: Set up your account to start issuing digital assets

investor.title: Investor Setup
investor.description: Set up your account to start investing in digital assets

wallet-security.title: Secure your Wallet
wallet-security.description: Set up protection for your wallet

system-settings.title: Configure System
system-settings.description: Set up system parameters and settings

security.title: Secure your Wallet
security.description: Set up protection for your wallet

identity.title: Verify Identity
identity.info: Identity verification ensures compliance with regulations and enables you to invest in digital assets.
identity.coming-soon-description: Identity verification is currently under development. In the meantime, we'll create your wallet so you can explore the platform.

wallet.subtitle: Your Digital Key to the Blockchain
wallet.intro: Think of your wallet as your master key that unlocks all your digital assets and identity on the blockchain. It's a secure set of cryptographic codes that proves you own your tokens and allows you to authorize transactions.
wallet.asset-control-description: View, manage, and interact with tokenized assets on the Asset Tokenization Kit platform. Your wallet gives you complete control over your digital assets.
wallet.invest-in-digital-assets-description: Explore and invest in a wide range of digital assets, including stocks, bonds, and more.
wallet.manage-your-digital-assets-description: Easily manage your digital assets, including buying, selling, and transferring them.
wallet.failed-to-create-wallet: Failed to create wallet. Please try again.
wallet.success-message: Congratulations! Your Web3 wallet has been successfully created
wallet.wallet-address-description: Your wallet address is your unique identifier on the blockchain. It's used to send and receive digital assets, and to interact with smart contracts.

method-selector.description: Just like your bank card requires a PIN to confirm payments, your wallet also needs protection to authorize actions securely.
method-selector.intro: Your wallet controls access to your valuable digital assets and identity. To keep it safe, you can secure it with a PIN code or enable one-time passwords (OTP) for added protection.

pin.title: PIN code
pin.description: A simple 6 digit code you enter on your device to quickly unlock your wallet. Easy and fast.

otp.title: One-Time Password (OTP)
otp.description: A time-based code generated by an authenticator app on your phone. Offers stronger security by requiring a unique code each time you log in.

method-selector.choose-one: You can choose one. As OTP is more secure, it is the recommended option.
method-selector.success-description: Your wallet is now secured! You can now continue to the next step.

pincode.title: Set up a PIN code
pincode.description: Create a 6-digit PIN code to secure your wallet transactions

recovery-codes.title: Your secret codes
recovery-codes.description-2: These codes can be used to recover your wallet if you forget your pin or lose access to your authenticator app.
recovery-codes.warning: Important: Keep these codes safe! They're your only way to regain access if you lose other security methods.

system.title: Deploy SMART System
system.description: Initialize the core infrastructure for your platform
system.deploy-blockchain-infrastructure: Deploy your blockchain infrastructure for asset tokenization
system.info: The SMART system is the foundation of your digital asset platform. It manages all token operations and ensures compliance.
system.smart-system-description: SMART System is SettleMint's comprehensive blockchain system that enables compliant asset tokenization with built-in identity management and regulatory compliance.
system.deployment-time-notice: This process may take 2-3 minutes to complete

messages.initial-loading: Preparing to deploy your SMART system...
messages.no-result-error: System deployment completed but no address was returned
messages.default-error: Failed to deploy your SMART system
messages.creation-failed: Failed to create system. Please try again.
messages.bootstrap-failed: Failed to bootstrap system. Please try again.
messages.system-created-bootstrap-failed: System created but bootstrap failed. You may need to manually bootstrap the system.
messages.error: Failed to deploy your SMART system

transaction-tracking.stream-timeout: System deployment tracking timed out after 90 seconds
transaction-tracking.waiting-for-mining: Deploying your SMART system on chain...
transaction-tracking.transaction-dropped: System deployment transaction was not confirmed on-chain in time
transaction-tracking.waiting-for-indexing: Waiting for system to be indexed...
transaction-tracking.transaction-indexed: System successfully indexed and ready to use
transaction-tracking.indexing-timeout: System indexing timed out, please refresh the page

assets.title: Select Asset Types
assets.description: Choose which digital asset types to enable on your platform
assets.your-asset-factories-ready: Your asset factories are ready for tokenization
assets.choose-asset-types: Choose the types of assets you want to tokenize on your platform
assets.info: Select the types of digital assets your platform will support. You can add more asset types later.
assets.select-all-asset-types: Select all the asset types you plan to tokenize
assets.select-description: Select one or more asset types to deploy their factory contracts
assets.no-system: System not found. Please deploy the system first.
assets.asset-factories-description: Asset factories are smart contracts that enable you to create and manage different types of tokenized assets. Each factory handles a specific asset class with tailored features and compliance requirements.

descriptions.bond: Tokenized debt securities with fixed income features
descriptions.equity: Digital shares representing ownership in companies
descriptions.fund: Investment fund tokens for pooled investments

factory-messages.factory-creation-failed: Failed to create token factory. Please try again.
factory-messages.no-result-error: No factory address received from transaction.
factory-messages.system-not-bootstrapped: System needs to be bootstrapped first. Please wait for system initialization to complete.
factory-messages.transaction-dropped: Transaction was not confirmed on-chain in time
factory-messages.waiting-for-indexing: Waiting for factory to be indexed...
